lux.executor.PandasExecutor module¶

class lux.executor.PandasExecutor.PandasExecutor[source]¶

Bases: lux.executor.Executor.Executor

static applyFilter(df: lux.luxDataFrame.LuxDataframe.LuxDataFrame, attribute: str, op: str, val: object) → lux.luxDataFrame.LuxDataframe.LuxDataFrame[source]¶

Helper function for applying filter to a dataframe

Parameters

  • df (pandas.DataFrame) – Dataframe to filter on

  • attribute (str) – Filter attribute

  • op (str) – Filter operation, ‘=’, ‘<’, ‘>’, ‘<=’, ‘>=’, ‘!=’

  • val (object) – Filter value

Returns

Dataframe resulting from the filter operation

Return type

pandas.DataFrame

static execute(viewCollection: lux.view.ViewCollection.ViewCollection, ldf: lux.luxDataFrame.LuxDataframe.LuxDataFrame)[source]¶

Given a ViewCollection, fetch the data required to render the view 1) Apply filters 2) Retreive relevant attribute 3) return a DataFrame with relevant results
